## Tuning Details

Please provide the notes for each bridge. You can:
- Upload a photo of your tuning chart (drag and drop below)
- Link to manufacturer specifications
- Manually list all notes (see example below)

### Example Format:
```
Bridge 1 (Treble):
  Left side: C6, B5, A5, G5, F5, E5, D5, C5
  Right side: G5, F5, E5, D5, C5, B4, A4, G4

Bridge 2 (Bass):
  Left side: E5, D5, C5, B4, A4, G4, F4
  Right side: (no strings)
```
